On 8/10/06, J. B. Rainsberger <jbrains@...> wrote:
>
> sethmalm wrot=
e:
>
> > Is it possible to use Junit 4 with BEA Workshop? If not, how can I=

> > have a tear down method that runs only once at the end of a test.
>
> =
I can only answer the second part of your question, although I imagine
> th=
e answer to the first part of your question is "yes, why not?"
>
> I assume=
 you want a tear down method that runs once at the end of a test
> /suite/,=
 meaning all the tests in a test class. If that is indeed what
> you want, =
then use @AfterClass instead of @After. There is also the
> corresponding @=
BeforeClass for @Before.


And if this doesn't suffice, I'll just point out=
 that TestNG also supports
@AfterSuite, @AfterTest and @AfterGroups.  A rea=
l embarrassment of riches.

And if it's not enough, please let us know what=
 you need and I'll do my best
to convince you that you don't need it :-)
